;今天是安柏的生日哦，我们快去为她庆祝吧！

;Today is [[Amber]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with her!
:'''Amber:''' Does this place look a little familiar to you, Traveler?
:'''Traveler:''' This is where I had my gliding license exam.
:'''Paimon:''' Whoa, you've got a really good memory!
:'''Amber:''' We just ended up strolling by here, huh. You've been to so many places since then... You're probably a lot stronger than you used to be. What do you say, wanna have a little contest?
:'''Amber:''' I've been spending most of my time in Mondstadt, but I haven't been slacking off, either!
:'''Traveler:''' Do you want to have a gliding contest?
:'''Amber:''' I'm up for anything! What about something a little more complex?
:'''Traveler:''' Hmm... We have to pick up five [[Sunsettia]]s along the way?
:'''Paimon:''' And also defeat three [[Anemo Slime]]s?
:'''Amber:''' Alright, you're on! Who do you think will win, Paimon?
